data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick Sendai.
In the minute 3, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
In the minute 5, Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Sendai.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Hiroshima at Yurtec Stadium.
Jumpei Iida signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sendai's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Sendai's Para has been booked in Sendai.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Sendai.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
Douglas Vieira of Hiroshima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 13, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 15, Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Hiroshima's area.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 19, Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 22, In Sendai, Hiroshima push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 26, In Sendai Sendai's Alexandre Guedes is caught offside.
Hiroshima's Tomoya Fujii gets in a shot on goal at Yurtec Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Jumpei Iida awards Sendai a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hayato Araki for Hiroshima who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 31, Hayato Araki is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Jumpei Iida signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Sendai.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 33, Sendai have a goal kick.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Yurtec Stadium.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Hiroshima at Yurtec Stadium.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Hiroshima drives forward and Tomoya Fujii gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Free kick Sendai.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, At Yurtec Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Yusuke Chajima gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hiroshima.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 47, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Yurtec Stadium.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 50, Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Sendai.
Douglas Vieira (Hiroshima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Jumpei Iida awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Sendai.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ryutaro Iio (Sendai) has received a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Para with Isaac Cuenca. This is the first substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
Kunimitsu Sekiguchi is replacing Takumi Sasaki for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 53, Sendai have a goal kick.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Kazuki Kushibiki for Hiroshima is whistled offside.
In the minute 54, Douglas Vieira of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 55, Ryo Nagai is replacing Ezequiel for the away team.
Hiroshima make their second substitution with Yuya Asano replacing Tsukasa Morishima.
Jumpei Iida signals a Sendai throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Free kick Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Yuya Asano misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
In Sendai, Yuya Asano of Hiroshima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 61, Sendai needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Hiroshima's Gakuto Notsuda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 62, Shunki Higashi is on a sub for Tomoya Fujii for Hiroshima.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's fourth substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Hayao Kawabe replacing Gakuto Notsuda.
In the minute 63, Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Hiroshima's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jumpei Iida awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Sendai.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sendai Hiroshima attack through Yusuke Chajima. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 68, Sendai have a goal kick.
Kunimitsu Sekiguchi's header is off-target for Sendai.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 71, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 73, In Sendai Hiroshima drive forward through Ryo Nagai. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ryo Nagai returns to the field for Hiroshima after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ryo Nagai.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a third substitution, with Hayato Teruyama replacing Alexandre Guedes.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Hiroya Matsumoto is replacing Yusuke Chajima for Hiroshima at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sendai's Yasuhiro Hiraoka breaks free at Yurtec Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Yurtec Stadium.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In the minute 84, Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Hiroshima will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sendai.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a fourth substitution, with Hiroto Yamada replacing Ryutaro Iio.
Takashi Kiyama is making the team's fifth substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Shogo Nakahara replacing Takuma Hamasaki.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Keiya Shiihashi for Sendai gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Yuya Asano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
